Hi, I am a software developer and HCI engineer. I did my MSc. in CS under the supervision of Dr. Nicholas Graham at EQUIS Lab, Queen's University (in Kingston,Canada). During my time there I worked with touch-screen computers and Microsoft Kinect for extending a game orchestration system (more info - here).I also did a Research Internship at Interactive Media Lab (TU Dresden, Germany). At IML, I developed a prototype of new style of multi-touch menu.

Now, that the blurb is out of the way, Feel free to look around - I have listed some of my work in this page and I am planning to blog (here). You can also browse my github repositories to see my sample work (here).
